howPlatformWork.title: ¬øHow to use the platform?
howPlatformWork.subtitle:
To use the MaiPet platform, you only need to purchase a GF-22 model GPS, available on Amazon, AliExpress, and numerous other websites.
The price of the GPS is usually less than 20 ‚Ç¨, and then you only need to get a mobile card for the GPS (like for a mobile phone).
Once you have the GPS, simply follow a few easy setup steps, and you'll be able to track your pet effortlessly.
Below are the setup instructions to show you how simple it is to register a pet on the platform.

instructions.title: Setup Instructions
instructions.subtitle: Below we explain in detail how to activate your pet's tracker on the platform.

prestep.title: SIM Card Installation
prestep.text1: With the tracker turned off, install the SIM card in the tracker, having previously deactivated the SIM card's PIN. You can do this by installing the SIM card in a mobile phone and deactivating the PIN.
prestep.text2: Once the SIM card is installed, turn on the tracker.

step0.title: Tracker Configuration
step0.resume: Below we explain the necessary steps to configure the tracker and activate it on the platform.

step1.title: 1. Tracker IMEI or Device ID
step1.resume: Get the ID/IMEI of your tracker (Its the number on the device label, but with 0000 at the beginning)

step2.title: 2. Set Platform Server
step2.resume: Configure the server of the platform where the tracker will report.

step3.text1: Leave the tracker on for about 10 minutes in a place with a direct view of the sky so it can position itself and start sending data to the platform.
step3.text3: You can activate the tracker on the platform by simply going to 'Add Pet' in the application menu and entering the IMEI you obtained at the beginning of this guide.

addSharedWithEmailText: Introduce the email of the user with whom you want to share the pet
cantShareWithYourself: You can't share the pet with yourself
confirmDeleteDevice: Are you sure you want to delete {{device}}?
